mapper.insert: insert into express(uuid, userId, name, status, type, sendName, receiveName, sendCity, sendAddress, receiveCity, receiveAddress, money, sendTime, receiveTime, sendPhone, receivePhone, weight) VALUES (#{express.uuid}, #{express.userId}, #{express.name}, 0, #{express.type}, #{express.sendName}, #{express.receiveName}, #{express.sendCity}, #{express.sendAddress}, #{express.receiveCity}, #{express.receiveAddress}, #{express.money}, #{express.sendTime}, #{express.receiveTime}, #{express.sendPhone}, #{express.receivePhone}, #{express.weight})
